# DRKD TRADELINK - Website Information for LLMs

## About This Website

DRKD TRADELINK is a comprehensive logistics and freight forwarding company based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. The company specializes in customs clearance, freight forwarding, road transport, and a wide range of logistics services for Indian and SEZ (Special Economic Zone) operations.

## Website Structure

### Main Pages
- **Homepage (/)**: Main landing page with services overview, company information, testimonials, and contact form
- **Card Page (/card)**: Duplicate of homepage content for business card sharing purposes

### Key Sections

1. **Hero Section**: Main value proposition - "The Platform for Indian Logistics"
2. **Services Section**: Comprehensive list of 18+ logistics services offered
3. **Why Choose Us Section**: Company advantages and differentiators
4. **Testimonials Section**: Customer reviews and testimonials
5. **Contact Section**: Quote request form with shipment details

## Services Offered

1. Customs Clearance
2. Freight Forwarding (Air & Sea)
3. Road Transport
4. Custom Brokers
5. Cargo Handling
6. Warehousing
7. Custom Bonded Warehouse
8. Bulk & Break Bulk
9. Project Cargo Handling
10. Stevedore
11. Flexi Tank Supply
12. Domestic Seaways Transport
13. Valuer
14. Surveyor
15. Pest Control
16. Tank Cleaning
17. Ship Chandler
18. NVOCC (Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier)

## Company Information

- **Name**: DRKD TRADELINK
- **Location**: A-123, Commerce House, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India
- **Email**: contact@drkdtradelink.com
- **Phone**: +91 12345 67890
- **WhatsApp**: +91 12345 67890
- **Service Area**: India (with SEZ specialization)

## Key Value Propositions

1. **Tech-Enabled Transparency**: Digital platform for real-time tracking and visibility
2. **SEZ Specialists**: Deep expertise in Special Economic Zone requirements
3. **24/7 Proactive Support**: Always-available dedicated point of contact
4. **One-Stop Solution**: Complete logistics services from customs to final delivery
5. **Firefighter Approach**: Proactive problem-solving before issues arise

## Technical Details

- **Framework**: Vanilla HTML with Tailwind CSS (CDN)
- **Fonts**: Inter (Google Fonts)
- **Form Handling**: Formspree (https://formspree.io/f/mdkyooop)
- **SEO**: Comprehensive meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, JSON-LD structured data
- **Accessibility**: ARIA labels, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation support
- **Performance**: Lazy loading images, preconnect for external resources

## Contact Form Fields

- Origin City/Port
- Destination City/Port
- Shipment Type (FTL, LTL, FCL, LCL, Air Freight)
- Primary Service Needed
- Full Name
- Company Name
- Work Email
- Contact Number
- Additional Details (optional)

## Target Audience

- Importers and exporters in India
- Businesses operating in SEZs
- Companies requiring customs clearance
- Businesses needing freight forwarding services
- Organizations requiring end-to-end logistics solutions

## Business Model

DRKD TRADELINK positions itself as a "firefighter" logistics partner, proactively solving problems and providing comprehensive logistics services. The company emphasizes transparency, technology-enabled solutions, and expertise in SEZ operations.

## Website Features

- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- Smooth scrolling navigation
- Mobile menu toggle
- WhatsApp integration button
- Real-time form validation
- SEO-optimized content
- Accessibility compliant

## Content Strategy

The website emphasizes:
- Trust and reliability
- Comprehensive service offerings
- Technology and transparency
- SEZ expertise
- Customer testimonials
- Easy quote request process
